wordGroup: ancestral temple 祠堂；宗庙；宗祠

sentences.en: Early embryos of many species develop ancestral features.
sentences.cn: 许多物种的早期胚胎具有其祖先的特性。

sentences.en: This ancestral species might have evolved at a time when the islands were connected.
sentences.cn: 这种祖先物种可能是在岛屿相连的时候进化而来的。

sentences.en: Of today's different groups of algae, green algae are probably the most similar to ancestral plants.
sentences.cn: 在今天的众多藻类中，绿藻可能与植物的祖先最为相似。
